item.title: Credits
item.description:
• Website theme is based on Simple Intro
  • Lunecron#5256 (discord tag) for creating the page art
  • Devicon for skill icons
  • Picum for projects without image

I try to give credit where due, but if I’m missing anyone please let me know me at shaddythefirst at gmail dot com.

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hello World

I’ve recently made some changes and updates to the site and theme to support blogging. This came with an updated front page image credits to Lunecron#5256 (discord tag).

I have been holding out on pushing the changes for a while since, although I do want to get into blogging, I haven’t yet written anything. An empty blog would look a little strange.
But I’ve decided it’s time. No point just letting it sit on my hard drive.
So here we go. My blog is out.
Maybe there will be more content in the future.
